name: The blind eye of the Lavaworm
data: It increases the users strength a bit.
It increases the users dexterity a bit.
It increases the users constitution a bit.
It decreases the users wisdom pitifully.
It decreases the users intelligence pitifully.
It has negative armour class for its type (negative in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives nice bonus to the spell 'light'.
It gives nice bonus to the spell 'darkness'.
Blindness has no effect on the wearer of this eyeball.
